138m  gauge 4 5 stitches per inch size 8 us 5mm circular needle s or dpns cable needle stitch holder or length of scrap yarn tapestry needle directions  cast on 30 sts and join in the round work *k2 p1* ribbing for 18 rounds or about 2 5 inches  increase row *k2 m1l p1* twice k2 p1 *k2 m1l p1* four times k2 p1 *k2 m1l p1* twice = 38 sts  from here onward mitten is worked in cable pattern below for first 19sts of each round and plain stockinette knit across for the last 19 sts that make up the palm thumb gusset at the same time as working the cable pattern below right mitten row 1 place a stitch marker on either side of the third palm stitch 22nd st left mitten row 1 place a stitch marker on either side of the last palm stitch 38th st both mittens row 2 when you get to the first marker slm m1r k1 m1l slm row 3 knit across slipping markers as you come to them row 4 knit across slipping markers as you come to them row 5 when you get to first marker slm m1r knit to next marker m1l slm  repeat row 3-5 until you have 13 sts in between markers next row when you get to first marker place the 13 gusset sts on a holder or length of scrap yarn removing markers cast on one stitch continue
